adrFormatAddress: 550 Grand St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I can't come up with enough positive adjectives to describe how great my shoot with Jeremy was, and how happy I am with the result. My shots are fantastic, he really brought out my best. Jeremy has such an ease about him as he works and it put me in the same relaxed state. I don't love getting my head shots done...but that changed for me after shooting with Jeremy. He offers a consultation ahead of time which is incredibly beneficial, we discussed what I was looking for, he had tons of great input, and when I saw him for the shoot day, it felt like meeting up with an old friend. I highly recommend working with Jeremy Folmer, he is a rock star and an absolute artist.

originalText.text: My headshots from Jeremy are absolutely perfect!  It's no surprise, because I was happy and relaxed working with him and his lovely wife Ann, who did my make-up flawlessly.  Jeremy gave me good wardrobe advice, and we planned a great mix of all the different shots I needed.  The feedback on these shots is excellent.  I recommend him wholeheartedly.

text.text: My headshots from Jeremy are absolutely perfect!  It's no surprise, because I was happy and relaxed working with him and his lovely wife Ann, who did my make-up flawlessly.  Jeremy gave me good wardrobe advice, and we planned a great mix of all the different shots I needed.  The feedback on these shots is excellent.  I recommend him wholeheartedly.

originalText.text: I contacted Jeremy to get new head shots after a friend recommended him. Jeremy was quick to answer any questions I had and provided a comfortable, professional environment in order to get the best shots possible. After we finished the shoot he quickly set up a gallery online for me to pick the one's I wanted to get retouched and was able to get the edit's back to me within two days.  I couldn't be happier with the results, thank you for such a great experience!

text.text: I contacted Jeremy to get new head shots after a friend recommended him. I couldn't be happier with the results, thank you for such a great experience!

originalText.text: I am an actor in NYC and trying to find an excellent photographer is a nightmare sometimes.  A talent manager suggested Jeremy Folmer.  He had told me he was a great photographer; he would send all of his clients to him.  So without hesitation, I made an appointed with Jeremy via his website.  Within the day, he got back to me and was very professional and kind.  I was thrilled to meet him and talk to him about what I wanted.  Finally I met with him and our consultation could not have gone better!!!  What was so awesome about it was that after having a friendly conversation, he expressed what he thought would be the best looks for me having observed me just through the few minutes of talking with him.  It was pretty incredible and spot on how well he was able to "cast" the looks that would fit me best.  I right away made the appointment with him and within the week, we met for the actual shoot.  He made it very comfortable and easy to work with especially with someone like myself who is not very fond of taking pictures! I felt at ease and relaxed with him giving me simple directions that allowed me to embrace the experience at its fullest.  And I've got to say, the quality of the pictures are phenomenal as well.  My manager is thrilled with the quality.  I really cant express how outstanding and professional Jeremy Folmer was!  Hands down, one of the best photographers this city has to offer!!  Do I recommend him to my actor friends who are in need of headshots or a reel?  Hell yes!!

originalText.text: I was recommended to Jeremy by multiple sources as I was looking around for professional headshots. When I reached out for more information, he clarified how important professional headshots really were from the industry's perspective, what to look for in a photographers style and choices as well as how I could best tailor a session, anywhere, to best suit some personal career goals. I was blown away at the breadth of his knowledge and felt very comfortable moving forward with him as I took this big step. During the session, there was never a dull moment as he was engaging and very much concerned over how comfortable I felt during the experience. Putting the client at ease and in a positive state is important so their best self shows up as a result and by the end of it I was having a blast. His technical skills are only matched by simple aesthetic principles he employs to best make you pop in your target pictures, which is very unique and so very helpful. Overall the photo shoot was easy, fun and worth every penny. I wholeheartedly recommend Jeremy Folmer to all who desire a simple, fun and rewarding headshot experience to complement their professional career in any form.
